amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to stopping the Department of Agriculture from not honoring contracts made with farmers and farm-serving organizations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1441 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1441 proposed by Senator Booker to Amendment SA 1717. To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to stopping the Department of Agriculture from not honoring contracts made with farmers and farm-serving organizations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1441 proposed by Senator Booker to Amendment SA 1717.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1441 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
